title: The Writer's Almanac  - Saturday, November 30, 2019
description: Today is the birthday of the man who became Mark Twain, Samuel Clemens (1835). He once said, “Familiarity breeds contempt — and children."
itunes:author: Prairie Home Productions
itunes:subtitle: Today is the birthday of the man who became Mark Twain, Samuel Clemens (1835). He once said, “Familiarity breeds contempt — and children."
